import atriya from "../assets/atriya.jpg"; import "./Founder.css"; export default function Founder() { return ( <>
{/* PHOTO SECTION */}

Shri K. V. Atriya

Founder President — The Brigade Education Trust

Education is not information — it is human engineering.
{/* TEXT CONTENT */}
{/* HIGHLIGHT GRID */} {/*
Post Graduate in English
Bachelor’s in Education
Bachelor’s in Commerce
PG Diploma in Environment Protection Mgmt
PG Diploma in Industrial Relations and Personnel Mgmt
PG Diploma in Journalism — Gold Medalist
*/} {/* TIMELINE (CLEANED) */} {/*
1998–2016 Worked across CBSE, AP Board, Gujarat Board, ICSE and ISC as TGT, PGT, Administrative Officer, Principal, Secretary and Correspondent.
Defence Hostels Superintendent, Sainik School Balachadi, Ministry of Defence, Government of India.
2016–17 Led School Management Committee Training across 1797 Government school complexes covering 2,09,235 members for Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan, Andhra Pradesh.
Research Blind peer reviewer for Arizona State University; published in IJIRMF and International Journal of Indian Psychology.
Talks Delivered talks at All India Radio and Doordarshan on Education and role of Teachers.
Training Former National Trainer at Sri Sathya Sai Vidya Vahini; active trainer in Human Values Education in Telangana.
*/} {/* FULL PROFILE */}

Shri K V Atriya is a Post Graduate in English, holds a Bachelor’s in Education and in Commerce, a Post Graduate Diploma in Environment Protection Management, a Post Graduate Diploma in Industrial Relations and Personnel Management and a Post Graduate Diploma in Journalism in which he was conferred with Sri Vasudev Rao Aurangabadkar Memorial Gold-Medal by Bhartiya Vidya Bhavan (2001)

He belongs to a rare professional category whose work experience range from Government Service to Private Service, School Education to Higher Education, from a regular service to Independent Service, from classroom teaching to faculty training, from a formal teaching/training to Educational Community Development Programs with research as his passion

); }
